desc.en: The visitor at the Game Development Department is none other than Rio, the president of Seminar. Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.
desc.jp: The visitor at the Game Development Department is none other than Rio, the president of Seminar. Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.
desc.thai: The visitor at the Game Development Department is none other than Rio, the president of Seminar. Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.
desc.ko: The visitor at the Game Development Department is none other than Rio, the president of Seminar. Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.
desc.zh_tw: 來到遊戲開發部的是研討會部長莉央。莉央說愛麗絲是「無名諸神的王女」，並說愛麗絲是魔王。雖然在場的所有人都很憤怒，但莉央很平靜地在談論愛麗絲可能會造成的未來。正當要爆發衝突時，C&C的第五個成員登場了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉央。莉央说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉央很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉央。莉央说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉央很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉央。莉央说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉央很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。

desc.en: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Nameless Army Divi: Sion, the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a metaphor with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.jp: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Nameless Army Divi: Sion, the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a metaphor with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.thai: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Nameless Army Divi: Sion, the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a metaphor with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.ko: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Nameless Army Divi: Sion, the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a metaphor with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央以最近發生的那件毀滅性事件為切入點，向眾人闡述了愛麗絲的真實身份：她並非什麼學生，而是Divi:Sion軍隊的指揮官、無名眾神的公主AL-1S。眾人無法接受這一解釋，而莉央則用遊戲作了簡單的闡述：愛麗絲是為了毀滅這個世界而生的“魔王”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央以最近发生的那件毁灭性事件为切入点，向众人阐述了爱丽丝的真实身份：她并非什么学生，而是Divi:Sion军队的指挥官、无名众神的公主AL-1S。众人无法接受这一解释，而莉央则用游戏作了简单的阐述：爱丽丝是为了毁灭这个世界而生的“魔王”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央以最近发生的那件毁灭性事件为切入点，向众人阐述了爱丽丝的真实身份：她并非什么学生，而是Divi:Sion军队的指挥官、无名众神的公主AL-1S。众人无法接受这一解释，而莉央则用游戏作了简单的阐述：爱丽丝是为了毁灭这个世界而生的“魔王”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央以最近发生的那件毁灭性事件为切入点，向众人阐述了爱丽丝的真实身份：她并非什么学生，而是Divi:Sion军队的指挥官、无名众神的公主AL-1S。众人无法接受这一解释，而莉央则用游戏作了简单的阐述：爱丽丝是为了毁灭这个世界而生的“魔王”。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.thai: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.ko: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones are partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.
desc.jp: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones are partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.
desc.thai: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones are partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.
desc.ko: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones are partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央向眾人道歉，表示讓愛麗絲接觸到那些機器人是她的失誤。儘管如此，會長表示此次非常幸運，因為愛麗絲接觸到的個體是比較不完整的，但強調之後或許就不會有如此運氣。莉央表示，此種方法只有一種解決方案。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央向众人道歉，表示让爱丽丝接触到那些机器人是她的失误。尽管如此，会长表示此次非常幸运，因为爱丽丝接触到的个体是比较不完整的，但强调之后或许就不会有如此运气。莉央表示，此种方法只有一种解决方案。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央向众人道歉，表示让爱丽丝接触到那些机器人是她的失误。尽管如此，会长表示此次非常幸运，因为爱丽丝接触到的个体是比较不完整的，但强调之后或许就不会有如此运气。莉央表示，此种方法只有一种解决方案。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央向众人道歉，表示让爱丽丝接触到那些机器人是她的失误。尽管如此，会长表示此次非常幸运，因为爱丽丝接触到的个体是比较不完整的，但强调之后或许就不会有如此运气。莉央表示，此种方法只有一种解决方案。

desc.en: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. Rio expressed her surprise about the fact that Aris' having a halo, despite her being a robot. No agreement made, Rio called Neru who was standing by all the time.
desc.jp: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. Rio expressed her surprise about the fact that Aris' having a halo, despite her being a robot. No agreement made, Rio called Neru who was standing by all the time.

desc.ko: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. Rio expressed her surprise about the fact that Aris' having a halo, despite her being a robot. No agreement made, Rio called Neru who was standing by all the time.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人與會長髮生了爭執。會長繼續闡述其解決方案：將愛麗絲的光環破壞掉，即殺死愛麗絲。此言一出甚至招致老師對其的不滿。莉央首先表示了對愛麗絲作為一臺機械卻擁有光環一事的驚訝，隨後與老師爭辯。爭辯無果，莉央叫來了一直在一旁的寧瑠清場。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉央首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉央叫来了一直在一旁的尼禄清场。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉央首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉央叫来了一直在一旁的宁瑠清场。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉央首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉央叫来了一直在一旁的宁瑠清场。

desc.en: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. Rio stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty angry at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.jp: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. Rio stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty angry at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.thai: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. Rio stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty angry at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.ko: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. Rio stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty angry at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央表示，C&C本就直屬她管理，某種意義上算她的保鏢。莉央強調眾人若不想受傷則不應做任何抵抗。然而寧瑠本身也對莉央的做法憤憤不平，因而開始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉寧瑠，並早就做好了應對手段。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央表示，C&C本就直属她管理，某种意义上算她的保镖。莉央强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而尼禄本身也对莉央的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉尼禄，并早就做好了应对手段。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央表示，C&C本就直属她管理，某种意义上算她的保镖。莉央强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而宁瑠本身也对莉央的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉宁瑠，并早就做好了应对手段。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央表示，C&C本就直属她管理，某种意义上算她的保镖。莉央强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而宁瑠本身也对莉央的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉宁瑠，并早就做好了应对手段。

desc.en: Rio gave Toki the command to take down Neru. Neru finally erupted and engaged with Toki.

desc.zh_tw: 莉央讓季搞定寧瑠，寧瑠終於爆發，與時開始戰鬥。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央让时搞定尼禄，尼禄终于爆发，与时开始战斗。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央让季搞定宁瑠，宁瑠终于爆发，与时开始战斗。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央让季搞定宁瑠，宁瑠终于爆发，与时开始战斗。

desc.en: Aris goes into a frenzy and loses consciousness, destroying the clubroom and attacking everyone in her wake. No one is able to stop Aris and the situation grows critical. At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.
desc.jp: Aris goes into a frenzy and loses consciousness, destroying the clubroom and attacking everyone in her wake. No one is able to stop Aris and the situation grows critical. At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.
desc.thai: Aris goes into a frenzy and loses consciousness, destroying the clubroom and attacking everyone in her wake. No one is able to stop Aris and the situation grows critical. At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.
desc.ko: Aris goes into a frenzy and loses consciousness, destroying the clubroom and attacking everyone in her wake. No one is able to stop Aris and the situation grows critical. At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.
desc.zh_tw: 暴走的愛麗絲失去理智，破壞了部室且攻擊了在場的所有人。情況岌岌可危，沒有人能阻止愛麗絲。C&C突然現身讓愛麗絲昏厥，並且解決了可疑的機器人。正當覺得鬆一口氣時，老師從綠的口中得知出乎意料之外的訊息。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 暴走的爱丽丝失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止爱丽丝。C&C突然现身让爱丽丝昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从绿的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 暴走的爱丽丝失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止爱丽丝。C&C突然现身让爱丽丝昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从绿的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 暴走的爱丽丝失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止爱丽丝。C&C突然现身让爱丽丝昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从绿的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。

desc.en: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.jp: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.thai: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.ko: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.zh_tw: 因未能擊倒眾人，愛麗絲重新充能光之劍。真紀試圖阻攔，但遭愛麗絲反向壓制。就在眾人束手無策時，一個熟悉的聲音出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因未能击倒众人，爱丽丝重新充能光之剑。真纪试图阻拦，但遭爱丽丝反向压制。就在众人束手无策时，一个熟悉的声音出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因未能击倒众人，爱丽丝重新充能光之剑。真纪试图阻拦，但遭爱丽丝反向压制。就在众人束手无策时，一个熟悉的声音出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因未能击倒众人，爱丽丝重新充能光之剑。真纪试图阻拦，但遭爱丽丝反向压制。就在众人束手无策时，一个熟悉的声音出现。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.thai: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.ko: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.jp: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.thai: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.ko: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠聽見爆炸聲前來協助，C&C全體壓制了愛麗絲。就在寧瑠詢問老師事情的前因後果時，綠和柚子突然一臉驚愕地發現桃井受傷嚴重。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在尼禄询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃井受伤严重。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在宁瑠询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃井受伤严重。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在宁瑠询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃井受伤严重。
